info.title: Database Threat Detection Policy APIs
info.description: Provides create, read and update functionality for database Threat Detection policies.

get.description: Gets a database's threat detection policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which database Threat Detection policy is defined.

parameters.name: securityAlertPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the security alert policy.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the database Threat Detection policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 500 GetDatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyFailed - Failed to get database Threat Detection security alert policies. * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Your settings are currently unavailable, please try again later

put.description: Creates or updates a database's threat detection policy.

parameters.name: databaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database for which database Threat Detection policy is defined.

parameters.name: securityAlertPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the security alert policy.

200.description: Successfully updated the database Threat Detection policy.

201.description: Successfully created the database Threat Detection policy.

default.description:
*** Error Responses: ***

 * 500 UpsertDatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyFailed - An error has occurred while saving Threat detection settings, please try again later * 500 DatabaseIsUnavailable - Your settings are currently unavailable, please try again later

DatabaseSecurityAlertPolicy.description: Contains information about a database Threat Detection policy.

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: Properties of the security alert policy.

DatabaseSecurityAlertPolicyProperties.description: Properties for a database Threat Detection policy.

state.description: Specifies the state of the policy. If state is Enabled, storageEndpoint and storageAccountAccessKey are required.

disabledAlerts.description: Specifies the semicolon-separated list of alerts that are disabled, or empty string to disable no alerts. Possible values: Sql_Injection; Sql_Injection_Vulnerability; Access_Anomaly; Usage_Anomaly.

emailAddresses.description: Specifies the semicolon-separated list of e-mail addresses to which the alert is sent.

emailAccountAdmins.description: Specifies that the alert is sent to the account administrators.

storageEndpoint.description: Specifies the blob storage endpoint (e.g. https://MyAccount.blob.core.windows.net). This blob storage will hold all Threat Detection audit logs. If state is Enabled, storageEndpoint is required.

storageAccountAccessKey.description: Specifies the identifier key of the Threat Detection audit storage account. If state is Enabled, storageAccountAccessKey is required.

retentionDays.description: Specifies the number of days to keep in the Threat Detection audit logs.

useServerDefault.description: Specifies whether to use the default server policy.
